existing_features.title: Update the Home page hero section copy to use the following English text: headline "High Performance Game Servers" and subheadline "Experience lightning-fast performance, unbeatable reliability, and 24/7 support for all your favorite games."

On the Home page hero section, remove the existing "View Plans" and "Learn More" buttons and replace them with a single primary button labeled "Get started" that navigates to the Plans page route (/plans).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update home page hero content to: "High Performance Game Servers" and description text provided
On home page, remove "View Plans" and "Learn more" buttons; add "Get started" button linking to the Plans page

projectName: Update home page hero text and replace CTA buttons with a single Get started link to Plans
